title: Alex Cora admits Red Sox were ‘a little hungover’ heading into Saturday’s game vs. Tigers

title: How Patriots have reportedly tried to resolve fumble issues
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots The Patriots lost four fumbles in their loss to the Steelers last week.
Rhamondre Stevenson lost two fumbles last week.

Barry Chin/Globe Staff By Conor Roche September 27, 2025 | 4:43 PM 2 minutes to read Rhamondre Stevenson won’t be disciplined for his two lost fumbles against the Steelers in Week 3, but the Patriots are still putting an emphasis on ball security ahead of Sunday’s matchup against the Panthers.

title: 5 things to know about Panthers ahead of Sunday’s matchup vs. Patriots
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots The Panthers have a few promising players on their roster despite their poor record over the last few years.
Tetairoa McMillan has emerged as a promising player for the Panthers.
(AP Photo/Rick Scuteri) By Conor Roche September 27, 2025 | 3:26 PM 3 minutes to read The Patriots will say hello to an NFC foe for the first time in 2025 when they host the Panthers on Sunday.

title: Now that Red Sox are in the playoffs, who should they want to play in Wild Card Series?

title: Can Marcelo Mayer return to Red Sox during playoffs?  Alex Cora says ‘he’s pushing’
author: Conor Roche

Marcelo Mayer has been out since July with a wrist injury.

title: Mass. man whose dog died in fireworks explosion to face charges
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News Kevin Ruiz, 54, of Dartmouth, will face multiple charges after a dog died in a house explosion on Sept.
A Dartmouth man is facing charges after a dog was killed in a house explosion and fire believed to be caused by fireworks.
